## DynamicAbstractGroup interface

Describes a group of controls.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DynamicAbstractGroup<TForm, TFormState extends object | null = null> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [controls](./dynamic-forms.dynamicabstractgroup.controls.md) | [ValidControlObject](./dynamic-forms.validcontrolobject.md)<!-- -->&lt;TForm, TFormState&gt; | The form controls that make up the group |
|  [disabledControls?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicabstractgroup.disabledcontrols.md) | [DisabledControls](./dynamic-forms.disabledcontrols.md)<!-- -->&lt;Partial&lt;TForm&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A map of controls that should be disabled by default |
|  [hideOnValueChangeMap?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicabstractgroup.hideonvaluechangemap.md) | [HideOnValueChanges](./dynamic-forms.hideonvaluechanges.md)<!-- -->&lt;Partial&lt;TForm&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A map of controls with a function that runs on form value changes that decides if control should be hidden. |
|  [panelClass?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicabstractgroup.panelclass.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A custom class added to the anchor tag of the group |
|  [validators?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicabstractgroup.validators.md) | ValidatorFn\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Validators for the form group |
